chunks.en: What to do when you're bored during Chinese New Year?
Visiting relatives? I barely have any.
Traveling? Crowds of people everywhere.

chunks.zh: 各位 v 友有没有同感的……
chunks.en: Any other v friends feel the same way...?

chunks.zh: 遍地牛粪今犹在，不见当年炸粪郎
chunks.en: Cow dung is still everywhere, but the guy who used to blow it up is nowhere to be seen.

chunks.zh: 过年还在背单词的在这里
chunks.en: Those who are still memorizing vocabulary during Chinese New Year are here.
Of course, it's time to go fishing.
What about friends?
Squatting (waiting)
A little gambling is good for the mood.

chunks.zh: 学习啊。不怕失业吗，哈哈。
chunks.en: Studying. Aren't you afraid of losing your job, haha.
Doing bad things

chunks.zh: 买鞭炮炸鱼塘炸菜炸粪坑ᶘ ᵒᴥᵒᶅ
chunks.en: Buy firecrackers to bomb fish ponds, vegetable gardens, and manure pits ᶘ ᵒᴥᵒᶅ

chunks.zh: 你们的兴趣、爱好和特长是什么
chunks.en: What are your interests, hobbies, and specialties?
Playing cards, playing Mahjong.

chunks.zh: 终于有时间搞点自己项目了
chunks.en: Finally have time to work on my own projects.
Playing relink
Watching dramas
Watching movies is better.

chunks.zh: 下个保卫萝卜，挺好玩的
chunks.en: Download Plants vs. Zombies, it's pretty fun.

chunks.zh: 没有，平时打游戏过年也打游戏。
chunks.en: No, I play games usually, and I play games during Chinese New Year too.

chunks.zh: 我也和你一样的想法，不想回家过年很累。和媳妇来了日本结果发现景点一样都是人挤人，韩国人中国人遍地都是😅
chunks.en: I have the same thought as you, I don't want to go home for the New Year, it's tiring. Came to Japan with my wife and found that the attractions are just as crowded, with Koreans and Chinese people everywhere 😅
Learning programming

chunks.zh: 躺下来，怎么开心怎么来
chunks.en: Lie down and do whatever makes you happy.
